questions.question: コンビニで年齢確認を（  ）されました。
questions.hint:
年齢確認（ねんれいかくにん, nenrei kakunin）- age verification
求める（もとめる, motomeru）- to request; to require

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 求め（もとめ, motome）- request; requirement

  • 履き（はき, haki）- putting on (shoes, pants)
  • 訴え（うったえ, uttae）- appeal; lawsuit
  • 巻き（まき, maki）- winding

English Translation: I was asked for age verification at the convenience store.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 求め（もとめ, motome）- request; requirement

  • 履き（はき, haki）- putting on (shoes, pants)
  • 訴え（うったえ, uttae）- appeal; lawsuit
  • 巻き（まき, maki）- winding

English Translation: I was asked for age verification at the convenience store.

questions.question: 今後のため、今回の件は社内に（  ）します。
questions.hint:
社内（しゃない, shanai）- inside the company
周知（しゅうち, shuuchi）- informing everyone; spreading awareness

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 周知（しゅうち, shuuchi）- informing all members

  • 阻止（そし, soshi）- prevention
  • 勧告（かんこく, kankoku）- recommendation
  • 分析（ぶんせき, bunseki）- analysis

English Translation: For future reference, this matter will be made known within the company.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 周知（しゅうち, shuuchi）- informing all members

  • 阻止（そし, soshi）- prevention
  • 勧告（かんこく, kankoku）- recommendation
  • 分析（ぶんせき, bunseki）- analysis

English Translation: For future reference, this matter will be made known within the company.

questions.question: 必要書類に不備がある場合、（  ）されることがあります。
questions.hint:
必要書類（ひつようしょるい, hitsuyou shorui）- required documents
不備（ふび, fubi）- deficiencies

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 受理を拒否（じゅりをきょひ, juri wo kyohi）- rejection of acceptance

  • 提出を強制（ていしゅつをきょうせい, teishutsu wo kyousei）- forced submission
  • 記入を催促（きにゅうをさいそく, kinyuu wo saisoku）- demand to fill in
  • 保存を促進（ほぞんをそくしん, hozon wo sokushin）- promotion of storage

English Translation: If there are deficiencies in the required documents, acceptance may be refused.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 受理を拒否（じゅりをきょひ, juri wo kyohi）- rejection of acceptance

  • 提出を強制（ていしゅつをきょうせい, teishutsu wo kyousei）- forced submission
  • 記入を催促（きにゅうをさいそく, kinyuu wo saisoku）- demand to fill in
  • 保存を促進（ほぞんをそくしん, hozon wo sokushin）- promotion of storage

English Translation: If there are deficiencies in the required documents, acceptance may be refused.
